#include <cstdlib>
#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int forward(int arr[],int n,int j)
{
int temp=arr[j];int count1=0;
for(int i=j+1;i<n;i++,temp++)
if(arr[i]!=temp+1)
{count1++;}
return count1;
}

int backward(int arr[],int n,int j)
{
int temp=arr[j];int count2=0;
for(int i=j-1;i>=0;i--,temp--)
if(arr[i]!=temp-1)
{count2++;}
return count2;
}

int main()
{
int arr[50];
int t,n;
scanf("%d",&t);
while(t--)
{
int count1=0;
int count2=0;
int count=0;int min=4000;
scanf("%d",&n);
for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
scanf("%d",&arr[i]);
for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
{
count1=forward(arr,n,i);
//printf("Count1 %d\n",count1);
count2=backward(arr,n,i);
//printf("Count2 %d\n",count2);
count=count1+count2;
if(count<min)
min=count;
//printf("Min %d\n",min);
}
printf("%d\n",min);
}
}
